src/lib/components/VegaComponent.react.j.description:
VegaComponent is an wrapper for react-vega's Vega component that is used to render vega specs.
It takes a vega or vega-lite 'spec', and some 'data' to merge into the spec and returns the
rendered visualisation.
For more info see: https://github.com/vega/react-vega/tree/master/packages/react-vega

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

spec.description: A vega/vega-lite spec in json format.

data.description: Data used to populate the vega spec. Data must be an Object with keys being dataset names defined in the spec's data field in json format.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
